attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Alan shearer a real sports idol and a real example to all those footballers on how to be a real sportsman and is also the all time leading premiership scorer, also he is a real legend and icon in Newcastle and around the footballing world, give him one he desevrves it more than any other footballer

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Give Alan Shearer a knighthood."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14882.asp

Prime Minister's Office
